title: Design of American public education
creator_contributor_role: United Productions of America, production company

description: Describes the organisational structure of a centrally controlled public education system and the decentralised system under state supervision. Points out that a basic objective of American public education is the advancement of an individualised system intended to produce students capable of assuming an adult role in society.
